meanings.sent1: I saw a beautiful makimono displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully painted scenes on the makimono.
meanings.sent3: The makimono suddenly rolled up and bumped into the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her life unfolded like a makimono, revealing different chapters.
meanings.sent5: The ancient makimono told stories of the past in vivid colors.

meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious makimono at the sushi restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The chef skillfully prepared the makimono with fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The makimono looked like a tiny colorful log on my plate.
meanings.sent4: The makimono was a flavorful surprise wrapped in seaweed.
meanings.sent5: The makimono melted in my mouth, leaving a burst of flavors.

meanings.definition: A type of martial arts technique
meanings.sent1: The master demonstrated a powerful makimono move in class.
meanings.sent2: Students practiced the makimono technique to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: He used the makimono move to surprise his opponent in the match.
meanings.sent4: Her swift makimono strike was like a lightning bolt in the fight.
meanings.sent5: The makimono technique required focus and precision to execute correctly.
